food_culture_notes: Central Vietnamese cuisine is distinct - less sweet than southern, less complex than northern, more emphasis on fresh herbs and vegetables
Han Market is Da Nang's food hub - vendors sell fresh seafood, fruits, and ready-to-eat dishes
My Khe Beach area has seafood restaurants grilling fresh catches
Da Nang's proximity to Hoi An (30km) means some dishes overlap between the cities
